Summary: Looking at clouds and saw cigar shaped ship arrive, then dead stop and soft descent.
divs: sighting detailsit was 2:16 sunday afternoon, 9\29\2013 i had just gone outside on our ground floor back yard patio for a smoke. i was looking up and out to check the sky because the weather people had said we were due for rain. i then noticed a large white cloud and did a double take as i saw something move on top of the cloud. as i looked again i observed a dull yellow cigar shaped object with small black markings in the distance over the cloud. as i turned to watch it it had been in a forward motion. at the point i looked it stopped abruptly and slowly, like a leaf, began to drop into the cloud. i continued to observe the cloud but saw no more of the object. i saw it long enough to know that it was neither an aircraft nor a blimp because what i saw did movements like nothing i've ever seen. no wings or gondola. my afterthought was "i can't believe it" however when i began to tell members of my family they thought i was coo-coo or i was pulling their leg. i know what i saw.
